Title: WindowPlace
Description: WindowPlace makes it possible to save Window positions and sizes to a profile. Switch between profiles to effortlessly move and resize your windows.
HomeWiki:
Project Description
WindowPlace makes it possible to save Window positions and sizes to a profile. Switching between profiles will effortlessly move and resize your windows. Help improve productivity - especially for multi-monitor systems.

Developed in C# using WPF and a few Windows API calls in the background.



The project is already in an Alpha development stage and works well (in my opinion)

If you have downloaded WindowPlace, I would really like to hear from you and see what you think

Helpful documentation still till come. Will be accelerated if I get some interest in the project.
